ResearchProjectDef.label: Request Early Shin-Ra Deployment
ResearchProjectDef.description: First stage of the Shin-Ra deployment plan on the Rimworlds, Leads to Shin-Ra Uniforms and Shin-Ra Early Weapons (All items Unlocked here are craftable at Tailor Benchs (both), Machining Table or electric smelter depending of Item, Mako Barrels are produced by time on the Lifestream Processor while turned on, also robotics and Gelnika targetters are crafted on their respective work tables).

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shin-Ra Uniforms
ResearchProjectDef.description: We received the first batch of recipes for basic uniforms and helmets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shin-Ra Early Weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: We received the first batch of recipes for standard issued Shin-Ra SMG's.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Planet Lifestream Study
ResearchProjectDef.description: We start an study to check Lifestream levels of the planet and start developing a Lifestream processing plan.(unlocks lifestream Processing Reactor to be build on top of Lifestream Pools to generate Mako Barrels)

ResearchProjectDef.label: Request further Shin-Ra Deployment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Second stage of the Shin-Ra deployment plan on the Rimworlds, Leads to Shin-Ra Utility Uniforms, Shin-Ra Intermedite Weapons, Shin-Ra Security I and MakSteel Production.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shin-Ra Security MK I
ResearchProjectDef.description: We received a data package containing recipes for building the Shin-Ra Laser Turret.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shin-Ra Security MK II
ResearchProjectDef.description: We received a data package containing recipes for building the Shin-Ra Missile Turret.

ResearchProjectDef.label: MakSteel Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: We received a data package containing recipes for creating MakSteel Alloy Ingots at the electric smelter.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shin-Ra Robotics MK I
ResearchProjectDef.description: We received a data package containing recipes for creating Heli Gunner Security Robots, Crane/hauling Robot, their weapons and the Shin-Ra Robotics table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shin-Ra Utility Uniforms
ResearchProjectDef.description: We received a data package containing recipes for Utility Uniforms.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shin-Ra Intermediate Weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: We received a data package containing recipes for standard issued Shin-Ra Assault Rifles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Request Advanced Shin-Ra Deployment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Second stage of the Shin-Ra deployment plan on the Rimworlds, Leads to Shin-Ra LeaderShip and Shin-Ra Advanced Weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shin-Ra Robotics MK II
ResearchProjectDef.description: We received a data package containing recipes for creating Tank Robots and it's weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shin-Ra LeaderShip
ResearchProjectDef.description: We received a data package containing recipes for Extra Outfits and Special Weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shin-Ra Advanced Weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: We received a data package containing recipes for Shin-Ra Sniper Rifles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: SOLDIER Equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: We received a data package containing recipes for Shin-Ra SOLDIER equipmens.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Request Total Shin-Ra Deployment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Third stage of the Shin-Ra deployment plan on the Rimworlds, Leads to Shin-Ra Power Armor,Shin-Ra Orbital Support.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shin-Ra Power Armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: We received an encripted data package containing recipes for our Grunt Power Armor and Dual Waist Guns.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shin-Ra Orbital Support
ResearchProjectDef.description: We received an encripted data package containing recipes for the Shin-Ra Communications Table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mako Energy Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: We received an encripted data package containing recipes for the Mako Powered Generator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shin-Ra Medical Facilities
ResearchProjectDef.description: We received an encripted data package containing recipes for the Mako Suspension Tank.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shin-Ra Mako Weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: We received an encripted data package containing recipes for the Shin-Ra Mako Guns, these are the best weapons Shin-Ra has.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shin-Ra Space Ships
ResearchProjectDef.description: (usseless unless you get OHU Dropship Mod and the Shin-Ra Company Airships sub-mod)We received an encripted data package containing the building plans for the Shin-Ra Space Gelnika MK I, this ship will allow us to travel around the planet at a cost of Refined Mako (Mako Barrels) WARNING: DO NOT LAND ON EDGE OR VISIT friendly bases they will be destroyed, you can still use it to trade or invade enemy outpost even land near a friend base and then start another land caravan to reach the friends base.(OHU core bug) .
